name: Slackme
description: Let people invite themselves to your Slack workspace

SLACK_API_TOKEN.description: A Slack API token (go to https://api.slack.com/web to know more).

SLACKME_COC.description: A URL to a Code of Conduct people must agree on before joining.

SLACKME_PORT.description: In case you want to change the server port.

GOOGLE_CAPTCHA_SECRET.description: Google captcha secret (go to https://www.google.com/recaptcha/about/ to know more).

GOOGLE_CAPTCHA_SITEKEY.description: Google captcha sitekey (go to https://www.google.com/recaptcha/about/ to know more).
